author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c
(entries_write): Use an absolute path for accessing the sqlite database.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(handle_external_item_change_wrapper):
Following up on r38644, remove duplicate check.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r35131, allow canceling an update with Ctrl+C while updating an
external. Before this patch the cancel error was eaten and the update
continued with updating the next external. Also place a few more values in a
shorter living pool.
* subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(handle_external_item_change_wrapper): Don't eat SVN_ERR_CANCELLED errors and
place the notification in the iter pool.

author: arfrever
msg: Polish translation update.
* subversion/po/pl.po: Polish translation update.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/update.c
(svn_client__update_internal):
Remove some obsolete parts of a comment. You can't mix old and new
clients in this sense. We upgraded the wc several times since this
comment was added, and in WC-NG we can assume it will be there, because
the check-out root always contains this information.
